mapper.sql: id, so_num, vbelnso, product_type_id, product_no, count_num, inwh_id, inwh_date, key_product_no, main_sku, sub_count, channel_order_sn, channel, sec_code, hp_les_date, resp_division
mapper.select: SELECT count(1) from OrderHPRejectionLogs orl left join OrderRepairHPRecords orhr on orl.product_no = orhr.machineNum LEFT JOIN OrderRepairLESRecords oles on orhr.orderProductId = oles.orderProductId LEFT JOIN OrderProducts op on op.id = orhr.orderProductId LEFT JOIN OrderRepairs ore on ore.id = orhr.orderRepairId LEFT JOIN Orders o on o.id = ore.orderId LEFT JOIN ProductTypes pt on pt.attrCateId = op.productType LEFT JOIN OrderRepairFromHps ofp on ofp.orderProductId = op.id LEFT JOIN OrderProductsAttributes opa on opa.order_product_id = op.id where orhr.checkResult = '2'

SELECT orl.sec_code, orl.product_type_id, orl.product_no, orl.hp_les_id, orl.hp_les_date, orhr.orderProductId, orhr.inspectTime, orhr.checkType checkType, orhr.woId, oles.storageType, op.cOrderSn,FROM_UNIXTIME(oles.addTime) addtimeTs, pt.typeName, opa.is_tz, o.orderSn, orhr.quality quality, ore.repairSn, ore.handleStatus, FROM_UNIXTIME(ore.addTime) repairdate from OrderHPRejectionLogs orl left join OrderRepairHPRecords orhr on orl.product_no = orhr.machineNum LEFT JOIN OrderRepairLESRecords oles on orhr.orderProductId = oles.orderProductId LEFT JOIN OrderProducts op on op.id = orhr.orderProductId LEFT JOIN OrderRepairs ore on ore.id = orhr.orderRepairId LEFT JOIN Orders o on o.id = ore.orderId LEFT JOIN ProductTypes pt on pt.attrCateId = op.productType LEFT JOIN OrderRepairFromHps ofp on ofp.orderProductId = op.id LEFT JOIN OrderProductsAttributes opa on opa.order_product_id = op.id where orhr.checkResult = '2'

SELECT orl.sec_code, orl.product_type_id, orl.product_no, orl.hp_les_id, orl.hp_les_date, orhr.orderProductId, orhr.inspectTime, orhr.netPointCode, orhr.checkType checkType, orhr.woId, orhr.TwoAppraisalDate, oles.storageType, op.productName, op.cOrderSn,FROM_UNIXTIME(oles.addTime) addtimeTs, pt.typeName, opa.is_tz, o.orderSn, orhr.quality quality, ore.repairSn, ore.refundAmount, ore.reason, ore.description, ore.typeFlag, FROM_UNIXTIME(ore.finishTime) finishTime, ore.handleStatus, FROM_UNIXTIME(ore.addTime) repairdate from OrderHPRejectionLogs orl left join OrderRepairHPRecords orhr on orl.product_no = orhr.machineNum LEFT JOIN OrderRepairLESRecords oles on orhr.orderProductId = oles.orderProductId LEFT JOIN OrderProducts op on op.id = orhr.orderProductId LEFT JOIN OrderRepairs ore on ore.id = orhr.orderRepairId LEFT JOIN Orders o on o.id = ore.orderId LEFT JOIN ProductTypes pt on pt.attrCateId = op.productType LEFT JOIN OrderRepairFromHps ofp on ofp.orderProductId = op.id LEFT JOIN OrderProductsAttributes opa on opa.order_product_id = op.id where ore.storageStatus = '2'

SELECT orl.sec_code, orl.product_type_id, orl.product_no, orl.hp_les_id, orl.hp_les_date, orhr.orderProductId, orhr.inspectTime, orhr.checkType checkType, orhr.woId, orhr.TwoAppraisalDate, oles.storageType, op.cOrderSn,FROM_UNIXTIME(oles.addTime) addtimeTs, pt.typeName, opa.is_tz, o.orderSn, orhr.quality quality, ore.repairSn, ore.handleStatus, FROM_UNIXTIME(ore.addTime) repairdate from OrderHPRejectionLogs orl left join OrderRepairHPRecords orhr on orl.product_no = orhr.machineNum LEFT JOIN OrderRepairLESRecords oles on orhr.orderProductId = oles.orderProductId LEFT JOIN OrderProducts op on op.id = orhr.orderProductId LEFT JOIN OrderRepairs ore on ore.id = orhr.orderRepairId LEFT JOIN Orders o on o.id = ore.orderId LEFT JOIN ProductTypes pt on pt.attrCateId = op.productType LEFT JOIN OrderRepairFromHps ofp on ofp.orderProductId = op.id LEFT JOIN OrderProductsAttributes opa on opa.order_product_id = op.id where orhr.packResult != '1'

SELECT orl.sec_code, orl.product_type_id, orl.product_no, orl.hp_les_id, orl.hp_les_date, orhr.orderProductId, orhr.inspectTime, orhr.TwoAppraisalDate, oles.recordSn, oles.storageType, op.cOrderSn,FROM_UNIXTIME(oles.addTime) addtimeTs,pt.typeName, FROM_UNIXTIME(ofp.successTime) successTime from OrderHPRejectionLogs orl left join OrderRepairHPRecords orhr on orl.product_no = orhr.machineNum LEFT JOIN OrderRepairLESRecords oles on orhr.orderProductId = oles.orderProductId LEFT JOIN OrderProducts op on op.id = orhr.orderProductId LEFT JOIN ProductTypes pt on pt.attrCateId = op.productType LEFT JOIN OrderRepairFromHps ofp on ofp.orderProductId = op.id where orhr.quality = '2' and oles.operate = '12'

SELECT orl.sec_code, orl.product_type_id, orl.product_no, orl.hp_les_id, orl.hp_les_date, orhr.orderProductId, orhr.inspectTime, orhr.TwoAppraisalDate, oles.recordSn, oles.storageType, op.cOrderSn,FROM_UNIXTIME(oles.addTime) addtimeTs, pt.typeName, opa.is_tz, pc.parentPath as parentPath, FROM_UNIXTIME(ofp.successTime) successTime from OrderHPRejectionLogs orl left join OrderRepairHPRecords orhr on orl.product_no = orhr.machineNum LEFT JOIN OrderRepairLESRecords oles on orhr.orderProductId = oles.orderProductId LEFT JOIN OrderProducts op on op.id = orhr.orderProductId LEFT JOIN ProductTypes pt on pt.attrCateId = op.productType LEFT JOIN OrderRepairFromHps ofp on ofp.orderProductId = op.id LEFT JOIN OrderProductsAttributes opa on opa.order_product_id = op.id LEFT JOIN ProductCates pc on pt.typeName = pc.cateName where orhr.quality = '2' and oles.operate = '12'

SELECT oles.recordSn from OrderHPRejectionLogs orl left join OrderRepairHPRecords orhr on orl.product_no = orhr.machineNum LEFT JOIN OrderRepairLESRecords oles on orhr.orderProductId = oles.orderProductId LEFT JOIN OrderProducts op on op.id = orhr.orderProductId where orhr.quality = '2' and oles.operate = '11' and oles.storageType = '22'

SELECT orl.sec_code, orl.product_type_id, orl.product_no, orl.hp_les_id, orl.hp_les_date,orhr.orderProductId,oles.recordSn,op.cOrderSn,FROM_UNIXTIME(oles.addTime) addtimeTs,pt.typeName from OrderHPRejectionLogs orl left join OrderRepairHPRecords orhr on orl.product_no = orhr.machineNum LEFT JOIN OrderRepairLESRecords oles on orhr.orderProductId = oles.orderProductId LEFT JOIN OrderProducts op on op.id = orhr.orderProductId LEFT JOIN ProductTypes pt on pt.attrCateId = op.productType where orhr.quality = '5' or orhr.quality = '6' and oles.operate = '12'
SELECT id FROM OrderHPRejectionLogs WHERE channel_order_sn =#{orderReprisSn}

SELECT h.id, h.channel_order_sn, h.count_num, h.product_no, h.sec_code, h.channel_order_sn FROM OrderHPRejectionLogs h, OrderRepairs r WHERE h.channel_order_sn = r.repairSn and h.EmptyOut='0' and r.handleStatus !='6' and h.inwh_id !=NULL and EmptyIn ='1'
